description: DataDiskManagedDiskParameters is the parameters of a DataDisk managed disk.

diskEncryptionSet.description: DiskEncryptionSetParameters is the disk encryption set properties

id.description: ID is the disk encryption set ID Empty value means no opinion and the platform chooses a default, which is subject to change over time. Currently the default is: "Default".

storageAccountType.description: StorageAccountType is the storage account type to use. Possible values include "Standard_LRS", "Premium_LRS" and "UltraSSD_LRS".
